overview: Witness if you will Gallus Domesticus--the backyard chicken. From healthy eggs to the family's new favorite pet, the chicken is forging a fresh place in the pecking order of human importance. From leading experts to suburban newbies, experience the humor and heart of what's fast becoming an international phenomenon--the return of the urban backyard chicken!
tagline: The return of the urban backyard chicken!
title: Mad City Chickens
